description.short: Two Android apps (WallApp + Mobile) and AWS IoT backend for $1B+ prefab smart home startup in Silicon Valley.
description.full: Veev Digital Home (originally Adomi) was the smart home technology embedded into Veev's prefab construction homes. The system had two Android applications: WallApp (kiosk tablets mounted on walls) and Mobile App (for homeowners). I developed both Android apps, AWS IoT backend services (Lambda, IoT Core, AppSync), Terraform infrastructure, React/Redux web admin panel, and Amazon Alexa voice integration. Implemented heartbeat monitoring, logging infrastructure (Logz.io ELK), and automated installation tools. The system runs in thousands of homes in the Bay Area.

challenge.context: MQTT authentication with AWS Cognito was a major technical challenge. Standard approaches didn't work for IoT device connections.
challenge.response: After 2+ months of investigation (ADO-134), including direct calls with AWS Support and cloud consultants, implemented custom solution using STS AssumeRoleWithWebIdentity for Cognito-authenticated MQTT over WebSocket.
details: MQTT over WebSocket authentication with Cognito - 2+ month investigation
Custom AWS IoT authorizer development attempts
IAM role permissions debugging for multi-tenant IoT access
WiFi instability on wall-mounted tablets - solved with Ethernet in new installations
Kiosk mode implementation for locked-down user experience
OpenHAB binding development for custom device types

achievements.title: WallApp - Kiosk Tablets
achievements.problem: Every room needed a dedicated smart home control interface that couldn't be closed or tampered with.
achievements.solution: Built Android WallApp running in Device Owner kiosk mode on wall-mounted tablets (Motorola G4, 7-inch devices) with Ethernet connectivity and heartbeat monitoring.
details: Android Device Owner provisioning for locked kiosk mode
Heartbeat monitoring every 1 minute via OpenHAB items
Installation Identifier for unique device tracking
Ethernet connection for reliability (fixed WiFi instability)
Works offline without cloud connection via local OpenHAB hub
Full-screen gesture controls for lights, blinds, climate, scenes
Debug menu with file logging and sharing for troubleshooting
Screen dimming and technician/control screen modes

achievements.title: Mobile App for Homeowners
achievements.problem: Homeowners needed remote access to control their smart home from personal devices.
achievements.solution: Built Android mobile app with Cognito authentication, MQTT real-time sync, and AppSync GraphQL integration.
details: MQTT over WebSocket with Cognito credentials
AppSync GraphQL for real-time state synchronization
Push notifications via Firebase and Pinpoint

impact.text: Remote home control for all homeowners

achievements.title: AWS IoT MQTT Authentication
achievements.problem: Needed secure MQTT connections from mobile apps authenticated via Cognito with proper IAM permissions per user/house.
achievements.solution: After 2+ months of R&D (ADO-134), implemented MQTT over WebSocket using STS AssumeRoleWithWebIdentity with Cognito tokens.
details: Cognito user pools with IoT policy attachment
Per-house topic permissions via IAM policies
Direct collaboration with AWS Support and cloud consultants
Created Java test applications for MQTT debugging

achievements.title: AWS IoT Backend Development
achievements.problem: Smart home system needed scalable cloud infrastructure for device state sync and remote control.
achievements.solution: Built serverless backend on AWS with Lambda, IoT Core, AppSync, API Gateway, and DynamoDB - all managed via Terraform.
details: AWS Lambda functions (Node.js) for event processing
AWS IoT Core for MQTT device messaging
AWS AppSync (GraphQL) for real-time state sync
Amazon API Gateway for REST endpoints
Amazon DynamoDB for device state storage
Amazon Lex for natural language processing

achievements.title: Terraform Infrastructure as Code
achievements.problem: Manual AWS setup across Dev/QA/Prod environments was error-prone and time-consuming.
achievements.solution: Implemented complete infrastructure as code using Terraform for all AWS resources.
details: Terraform modules for Lambda, API Gateway, IoT, Cognito
Collaboration with AllCloud consultants for best practices

achievements.title: React/Redux Web Admin Panel
achievements.problem: Needed admin interface for house configuration, location management, and device setup.
achievements.solution: Built web admin panel using React and Redux for location import/export and house management.

achievements.title: APM Automation Tool
achievements.problem: Manual house installation configuration was tedious and error-prone for installers.
achievements.solution: Created automation tool for generating OpenHAB sitemaps, device groups, and configuration files.

achievements.title: Amazon Alexa Integration
achievements.problem: Users wanted voice control for their smart home devices.
achievements.solution: Integrated Amazon Alexa Smart Home Skill with full voice control of lights, climate, locks, and more.
details: Voice control for all device types
Amazon Lex for natural language processing

achievements.title: OpenHAB Smart Home Server
achievements.problem: Needed local hub for device communication that works even when cloud is unavailable.
achievements.solution: Configured and extended OpenHAB server with custom bindings for Z-Wave and DMX devices.

achievements.title: CI/CD Pipeline Setup
achievements.problem: Manual builds and deployments slowed down development cycle.
achievements.solution: Set up Bitbucket Pipelines for Android builds with automatic version incrementing and APK publishing.
details: Firebase project migration to Google Play account

achievements.title: Push Notification System
achievements.problem: Users needed real-time alerts for doorbell, security events, and system status.
achievements.solution: Implemented push notifications using both Firebase Cloud Messaging and AWS Pinpoint.
details: AWS Pinpoint for iOS and Android

achievements.title: Monitoring & Logging Infrastructure
achievements.problem: Needed comprehensive monitoring for thousands of WallApp installations and troubleshooting capabilities.
achievements.solution: Designed multi-tier logging architecture with heartbeat monitoring, Logz.io ELK stack, and Installation Identifier tracking.
details: Heartbeat system - 1 minute intervals via OpenHAB items
Installation Identifier for unique device tracking (persists across upgrades)
Logz.io ELK stack for centralized log analysis
Multi-tier storage: device → home server → S3 → ELK
WallApp online status monitoring per house
File logging with debug menu sharing

achievements.title: Smart Home Scenes
achievements.problem: Users wanted one-tap automation for complex device combinations (e.g., 'Movie mode').
achievements.solution: Implemented scenes support allowing grouped device actions triggered by single button.
